description:
With Debian 8.6 jessie, and in Newton, when executing the following command to create a test instance in Openstack (following the official Openstack newton for debain guide):


openstack server create --flavor m1.nano --image cirros --security-group default --key-name mykey provider-instance


I get the following error:

Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'glanceclient.exc.HTTPInternalServerError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-64808b32-4971-4ab0-8a80-540b1f6cb527)


Here's the nova-api-log as suggested:

2017-04-07 11:08:06.195 30396 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions [req-ba2fba0c-7800-4886-9837-5d5ab0381eff c70c1c93d7b940dfb4255d8421d12009 5caa95a73f114f0584c9cd8ed3b02d2f - - -] Unexpected exception in API method

title: <class 'glanceclient.exc.HTTPInternalServerError'> (HTTP 500)

comments.content:
With Debian 8.6 jessie, and in Newton, when executing the following command to create a test instance in Openstack (following the official Openstack newton for debain guide):


openstack server create --flavor m1.nano --image cirros --security-group default --key-name mykey provider-instance


I get the following error:

Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'glanceclient.exc.HTTPInternalServerError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-64808b32-4971-4ab0-8a80-540b1f6cb527)


Here's the nova-api-log as suggested:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~francisco.lopez

comments.content: Looks like something failed on the glance side, check the glance API logs for details.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: It also looks like you're using glance v1. Nova deprecated support for glance v1 in Newton and defaulted to using glance v2. Make sure you have the config correct and see if you are running glance v1 and/or v2 API endpoints.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
